オプション1: The next day, Star Man went with the kids to the coast where the coconut trees grew.

オプション1:
Star Man looked out over the ocean, hoping to spot another island.
But all he could see on the horizon was sky and sea—nothing more.
"I'm going to walk clockwise around the island to see if I can find anything across the water."
After parting ways with the kids, Star Man walked counterclockwise along the coast.
Since the island was mostly mountainous, the only ways to check beyond the sea were to either reach the summit or circle the entire coastline.
